about_the_game:
Pets Book

This Pets-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Dogs, Cats, Lizards and more!

Using inspiration from some real-life pets submitted by our players, deciding which is the most adorable is impossible!

Contents

The Pets book unlocks the following images:
  • Corgi - 42x55
  • Cat in a Hat - 48x67
  • Chinchilla - 54x81
  • Bunnies - 67x31
  • Rat - 79x84
  • Sven - 82x88
  • Budgie - 83x136
  • Gerbils - 84x58
  • Neva Masquerade - 84x58
  • Ferret - 92x65
  • Snake - 93x80
  • Guinea Pigs - 95x93
  • Growing Up - 100x75
  • Hamster - 103x72
  • Bearded Dragon - 105x128
  • Fries - 120x98
  • Nap Time - 135x53
  • Toys - 150x100
  • Tortoise - 158x62
  • Fish Tank - 208x145

Pets Book

This Pets-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Dogs, Cats, Lizards and more!

Using inspiration from some real-life pets submitted by our players, deciding which is the most adorable is impossible!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.14
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: Coloring Pixels - Pets Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
